Package SettingsTab

package SettingsTab
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AccountInfoActivity
    Activity for managing user account information.
    AdminActivity
    AdminActivity provides administrative control over users.
    ChangeEmailActivity
    Activity for changing the current user's email address.
    ChangeUserActivity
    Activity that allows the user to change their username.
    PutEmailAdmin
    This activity allows administrators to change the username of a user.
    PutUserAdmin
    Page where Admin will change username (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)
    SettingsActivity
    An Activity that provides various settings options to the user, such as account information, submitting tickets, and logout functionality.
    UserListActivity
    Page where admins can view all users via a GET request (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)
